instructions:
Add frozen vegetables to 3/4 cup of salted boiling water. Return to boiling and simmer covered for 5
minutes. Drain and set aside.
Melt butter over low heat in a small sauce pan and stir in flour, salt, pepper and mixture of spices. Add
milk all at once and cook till thickened and bubbly. Add cream cheese and stir until melted. Stir in
vegetables. Spoon into 2 individual oven-ware dishes, dot with butter and sprinkle with bread crumbs. Bake
in 350 F oven for 15 minutes. Serves 2.

VARIATION:
Instead of onions and peas, substitute a 10 oz package of frozen mixed vegetables. 
*(Rev. 3/18/94)*
ingredients: 1/4 tsp of mixture of basil, oregano and marjoram
name: Creamed Onions And Peas
creator: Jim Decker
